bucket.description: The name of the bucket it applies to.

default_acl.description: Configure this ACL to be the default ACL.

predefined_acl.description: The canned GCS ACL to apply. Must be set if role_entity is not.

role_entity.description: List of role/entity pairs in the form ROLE:entity. See GCS Bucket ACL documentation  for more details. Must be set if predefined_acl is not.
